title: So, how do you discover new mains?
body:
Recently discovered that I'm very good with Shen all of a sudden, so I've decided to main him. I've played Shen around 5 times in ranked the past few days, and I've done very well every time, even getting 13/0/33 in one of the games. Not to mention, playing Shen gives me better map awareness, since it's my job and all. :P

Very fun to play, will abuse.

Who's your most recent main, and why are you maining them?
